name: 6 Shots, 2 Guns
description:
You're Malik, the best shot in the West, and you're always accompanied by your faithful blind and deaf mule Sylvester. But last night Sylvester was kidnapped! You only have two six-shot guns on you to get him back.

WASD to move, mouse to aim and shoot.

Made by: Zane Hedges, Jeff Land, Johanne Conover, and Andrei Osypov
